scripts.test: cd trading && DEBUG=* QUOTE_CUR=BTC EXCHANGE=binance TIMEFRAME=15 API_KEY=keys  node --inspect=0.0.0.0:5858 app
scripts.build-push: cd admin && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'publishing'>>/dev/null && git push origin master>>/dev/null && cd ..
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build-push && pm2 deploy ecosystem.config.js dev
